notes: indefinite singular for s+consonant and z
definite article used before z and s+consonant

example_sentence_italian: I nuovi zaini sono sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: The new backpacks are on the table.

notes: definite plural for z and s+consonant
example_sentence_italian: Ho visto gli zaini nel corridoio.
example_sentence_english: I saw the backpacks in the hallway.

example_sentence_italian: Ho preso degli zaini dal negozio.
example_sentence_english: I bought some backpacks from the store.

example_sentence_italian: La cerniera dello zaino è rotta.
Ho attaccato la targhetta allo zaino.
example_sentence_english: I attached the tag to the backpack.

example_sentence_italian: Ho attaccato gli adesivi agli zaini.
example_sentence_english: I attached the stickers to the backpacks.

example_sentence_italian: Ho preso il biglietto dallo zaino.
example_sentence_english: I took the ticket from the backpack.

example_sentence_italian: Ho preso i libri dagli zaini.
example_sentence_english: I took the books from the backpacks.
Put the snack in the backpack.
There are books in the backpacks.
There is a stain on the backpack.

example_sentence_italian: Ho informazioni sugli zaini in vendita.
example_sentence_english: I have information about the backpacks for sale.

example_sentence_italian: Vado a scuola con lo zaino.
example_sentence_english: I go to school with the backpack.
